definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: When pneumothorax occurs temporally with menstrual cycles, catamenial pneumothorax should be suspected.
sentences.chinese: 当气胸发生在月经来潮时要怀疑胸腔子宫内膜异位症。

sentences.english: M. Obtain a chest film to identify the position of the intravenous line and a possible pneumothorax.
sentences.chinese: 拍胸片以确定静脉内导管的位置和可能发生的气胸。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of treat spontaneous pneumothorax by thoracoscope operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结电视胸腔镜下治疗自发性气胸的体会。

sentences.english: Methods chnical date of 48 double spontaneous pneumothorax was analysised.
sentences.chinese: 方法分析48例老年人双侧自发性气胸的临床资料。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up clinical experience of open hemothorax .
sentences.chinese: 目的总结开放性血气胸临床治疗经验。

sentences.english: To explore a simple and effective means to treat Spontaniety Pneumothorax(SP).
sentences.chinese: 探讨自发性气胸简单有效的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Thoracoscope in the treatment of spontaneous pneumothorax is safe and effective.
sentences.chinese: 结论胸腔镜治疗自发性气胸安全有效。

sentences.english: Primary spontaneous pneumothorax (PSP) most commonly occurs in young, tall, lean males.
sentences.chinese: 原发型自发性气胸常发生于瘦高之年轻男性。

sentences.english: This case report presents a non-smoking young female patient who was neither tall nor thin, and who experienced repeated attacks of spontaneous pneumothorax.
sentences.chinese: 本例为一年轻不高不瘦不抽烟之女性反复气胸发作。

sentences.english: Pneumothorax is the most common presentation of this disorder.
sentences.chinese: 气胸是此类疾病最常见的症状。

sentences.english: A 19-year-old female presented with symptoms of right-sided pneumothorax.
sentences.chinese: 本文报告一位十九岁女性出现右侧气胸。

sentences.english: This radiograph demonstrates a right pneumothorax. Note the displacement of the heart to the left.
sentences.chinese: 线显示右侧气胸，可见心影左移。

sentences.english: The performance of tension pneumothorax What is this?
sentences.chinese: 张力性气胸的表现是什么？

sentences.english: To explore the clinic feature, treatment and prevention of delayed hemopneumothorax induced by thoracic trauma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胸外伤迟发性血气胸临床特点及防治措施。

sentences.english: Conclusion Closed drainage of thoracic cavity with tubule is an effective way to treat pneumothorax.
sentences.chinese: 结论细管胸腔闭式引流是一种较好的治疗气胸的方法。

definition: pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
